headline: Microsoft's harsh decision frustrates gamers
summary: Gamers brace as Microsoft turns the screw.

headline: Does Take-Two’s Latest Price Rally Reflect Risks After BioShock 4 Studio Layoffs?
summary: Thinking about whether to hold, buy, or sell your Take-Two Interactive Software shares? You are far from alone. This stock has been on quite a ride lately, climbing 4.6% in just the past week, notching up almost 10% over the past month, and delivering a remarkable 39.5% gain year-to-date. If you zoom out even further, those holding steady for a year have seen a staggering 68.7% return, with longer-term holders doubling their money since 2022. Clearly, investors have been paying...
